quest.name: Catching and Fletching
journal:
Eshana wishes to lay in a surplus of arrows.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Search the designated locations for regal gaganas, and slay them for their feathers.
Deliver bundles of feathers to Eshana.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Greetings, Forename. As you know, my sssisters and I often employ the bow as our weapon of choice.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Without a sssteady sssupply of arrows, however, the bow becomes little more than a frail ssstaff. If you would do usss the honor, I would asssk that you gather one of the materials used to conssstruct our ammunition.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: A fine arrow needs a ssstraight shaft, of course, but it is the fletching which guides the missile far and true. We've found the feathers taken from the ssso-called “regal” gagana to bessst keep their shape...when we can get them.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: This breed of gagana ssstalks the Ssstriped Hills, and are fearsssome birds indeed. Ssslay a pair of them, and pluck from their hides as many undamaged feathers as you can.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Yesss, these are perfect! As a huntress, my fingers already ache to loose the arrows made with sssuch feathers.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: We go through many missiles during our duties on the border, and will always need more materials. I will be sure to call on you again when our ssstock of feathers is running low.
